definitions.definition: the 2nd month of the year, between January and March

examples.text: The meeting is on the fifth of February/February the fifth.
The meeting is on February fifth.
We went to Japan last February.
I arrived at the end of February.
It was a cold February morning.

wordOrigin: Middle English feverer, from Old French feverier, based on Latin februarius, from februa, the name of a purification feast held in this month. The spelling change in the 15th cent. was due to association with the Latin word.
